EmailTemplate.name: RFP - Other
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - Please pay your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} license late fee by {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_From_Today_120__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LICENSED SUBMITTED Hi {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
Your application is currently under review. We will reach out directly with any questions.
Thanks & Regards, Washington Department of Licensing
